messages.message:
Hey team, I'm wondering if we should update the tsc check on PR to run all every PR against any branches, not just master. This can help us catch issues where we accidentally backport a component that didn't exist in earlier versions of Pollen.
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/6ab6713886cfa3832c2f6e1473fbfa0c58649e9e/.github/workflows/tsc.yml#L3-L7
node version in release branches before July when we upgrade node to v18 would be different but it would at least benefit us when we backport PRs to branches created after July
